original: @224b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: rgya gar skad du

original: @225a * // badzra shrim kha l'a s'a dha na au pa yi ka /
analyzed: badzra shrim kha la sa dha na au ba yi ka

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du

original: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga /'phags ma rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga ma rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la phyag tshal lo

original: dang por re zhig sngags pas stan bde ba la nye bar 'dug ste /
analyzed: dang por re jig sngags ba stan bde ba la nye ba dug ste

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid do zhes de bzhin du brjod nas /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong ba nyid do zhes de bzhin du rjod nas

original: gzhan gang zhig rnams kyang 'dis chos rnams stong pa nyid kyi mthar blta zhing phun sum tshogs par bskyed nas /
analyzed: gzhan gang jig rnams kyang dis chos rnams stong ba nyid kyi mthar lta zhing phun sum tshogs ba skyed nas

original: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba la sogs pa bya'o //
analyzed: dkon(d) mchog gsum la skyob su gro ba la sogs ba byed

original: de nas ji srid sems can dang sems can gyis bsdus pa rnams yang dag par blangs nas bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dgod par bya'o zhes so //
analyzed: de nas ji srid sems can dang sems can gyis sdud ba rnams yang dag ba blangs nas bdag gis thams cad mkhyen ba ye shes la god ba byed zhes so

original: de nas snying gar sna tshogs chu skyes /
analyzed: de nas snying gar sna tshogs chu skye

original: de'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: de steng du nyi ma dkyil khor

original: de nas h'um yig las skyes pa'i rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i bdag nyid 'ching ba thams cad gcod pa /
analyzed: de nas hum yig las skye ba rdo rje lcags sgrog ma bdag nyid ching ba thams cad gcod ba

original: gdug pa'i sems can rnams 'dul ba /
analyzed: gdug ba sems can rnams dul ba

original: sku mdog ljang gu zhal gsum pa /
analyzed: sku mdog ljang gu zhal gsum ba

analyzed: spyan gsum gsum ba g-yas ba zhal ser skya la spyan ser skya

original: zhal g-yon pa khro gnyer can /
analyzed: zhal g-yon ba khro gnyer can

original: dmar po mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
analyzed: dmar po mche ba gtsigs ba

original: zhal dang po cung zad bzhad pa'o //
analyzed: zhal dang po cung zad bzhad ba

original: phyag brgyad pa g-yas kyi dang pos mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa /
analyzed: phyag brgyad ba g-yas kyi dang pos mi jigs ba sbyin ba

original: gnyis pa na rdo rje /
analyzed: gnyis ba na rdo rje

analyzed: gsum ba na rdo rje lcags sgrog bzhi ba na

original: gnyis pa na sdigs mdzub /
analyzed: gnyis ba na sdigs mdzub

original: gsum pa na zhags pa /
analyzed: gsum ba na zhags ba

original: bzhi pa na gzhu'o //
analyzed: bzhi ba na gzhu

original: sangs rgyas kyi sprin tshogs 'phro ba shin tu rol pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: sangs rgya kyi sprin tshogs phro ba shin tu rol ba stabs kyis bzhugs ba

original: byi la'i pags pa'i stod g-yogs byas pa'i rdo rje lcags sgrog ma bsgom par bya'o //

original: skad cig gis byang chub kyang thob na dngos grub gzhan smos ci dgos /
